TopicTitle: Returning to craft view with 'M' zooms all the way in

Articles.Content:
KSP2 0.1.2.0
Windows 10
i5-13600K, 4070ti

When I'm in map view and press 'M' to go back to craft view the camera is zoomed into the middle of the ship.

Seems to work fine if instead you use the button at the bottom of the screen to do it

No mods installed

Confirmed, this is EXTREMELY bad, it should return to the previous zoom setting  it was at when switching and in map view return to the SAME focused object and zoom, not switch focus back to my craft if I have it focused somewhere else. Though using the UI buttons doesn't make a difference for me.
